sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEM WHERE MEM_LATELY_LOG_DATE < SYSDATE-10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEM WHERE MEM_LATELY_LOG_DATE < SYSDATE - 10 <isEqual property="schType" compareValue="all"> and 1=1 </isEqual> <isEqual property="schType" compareValue="memName"> and mem_nm like '%'||#schText#||'%' </isEqual> <isEqual property="schType" compareValue="memId"> and mem_code like '%'||#schText#||'%' </isEqual>

select mem_code as id, mem_nm as name, mem_lately_log_date from ( select ROWNUM as rnum, mem_code, mem_nm, mem_lately_log_date from (select mem_code, mem_nm, mem_lately_log_date from mem where mem_lately_log_date < sysdate-10 order by 1 desc ) where ROWNUM <=#endRow# ) where rnum >= #firstRow#

select * from mem WHERE MEM_LATELY_LOG_DATE < SYSDATE - 10 <isEqual property="schType" compareValue="all"> and 1=1 </isEqual> <isEqual property="schType" compareValue="memName"> and mem_nm like '%'||#schText#||'%' </isEqual> <isEqual property="schType" compareValue="memId"> and mem_code like '%'||#schText#||'%' </isEqual>

select mem_code as id, mem_nm as name, mem_pwd as pwd, mem_ph, mem_photo, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_lately_log_date, mem_add1, mem_kor_for, mem_gender, mem_bir, type_di, non_mem_at, consulting, open_at, attach_file, privacy_collect_agree, mem_post_numb1, mem_enabled, sch_code, career_ind_code, career_job_code, ca_comp_nm, ca_work_content, ca_func_compet_aw_at, ca_compet_di, ca_rank, ca_compet_nm, ca_aw_date, ca_work_bd, ca_work_ed, career_code, sch_major_code, sch_coll, sch_major_nm, sch_code_nm, authorities, enabled, mem_enname, mem_add2, mem_post_numb2, mem_add3, mem_add4, mem_jang, mem_email_agree, reg_num1, reg_num2, mem_pass_em, mem_enrolldate from mem

select mem_code as id, mem_nm as name, mem_pwd as pwd, mem_ph, mem_photo, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_lately_log_date, mem_add1, mem_kor_for, mem_gender, mem_bir, type_di, non_mem_at, consulting, open_at, attach_file, privacy_collect_agree, mem_post_numb1, mem_enabled, sch_code, career_ind_code, career_job_code, ca_comp_nm, ca_work_content, ca_func_compet_aw_at, ca_compet_di, ca_rank, ca_compet_nm, ca_aw_date, ca_work_bd, ca_work_ed, career_code, sch_major_code, sch_coll, sch_major_nm, sch_code_nm, authorities, enabled, mem_enname, mem_add2, mem_post_numb2, mem_add3, mem_add4, mem_jang, mem_email_agree, reg_num1, reg_num2, mem_pass_em, mem_enrolldate from mem where mem_code=#id#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEM
WHERE 1=1
WHERE mem_nm like '%'||#schText#||'%'
WHERE mem_code like '%'||#schText#||'%'

select mem_code as id, mem_nm as name, mem_pwd as pwd, mem_ph, mem_photo, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_lately_log_date, mem_add1, mem_kor_for, mem_gender, mem_bir, type_di, non_mem_at, consulting, open_at, attach_file, privacy_collect_agree, mem_post_numb1, mem_enabled, sch_code, career_ind_code, career_job_code, ca_comp_nm, ca_work_content, ca_func_compet_aw_at, ca_compet_di, ca_rank, ca_compet_nm, ca_aw_date, ca_work_bd, ca_work_ed, career_code, sch_major_code, sch_coll, sch_major_nm, sch_code_nm, authorities, enabled, mem_enname, mem_add2, mem_post_numb2, mem_add3, mem_add4, mem_jang, mem_email_agree, reg_num1, reg_num2, mem_pass_em, mem_enrolldate from mem
WHERE 1=1
